note.para: Do you know of a restaurant that was doing really well until it moved into a larger space? Often this happens because the owners thought their profits could handle the costs of the increased space. Unfortunately, they were not really aware of the cost of their food. It’s critical to keep track of product costs for pricing and cost control.
